RT‚ÄÇíì∏ Odysseas íì∏ Nomad is hiring ìÄ†ìÄ†ìÄ†
Introducing 'odyslam/gm'
A **very** opinionated setup script that will install:
- dev toolchain for rust, javascript and Ethereum
- GUI apps
- dotfiles
Currently it supports MacOS, Linux is TBD
Kudos to @cloudhead and @0x12b for the inspiration‚ÄÇhttps://github.com/odyslam/gm
